text.section: A title insurer may not make or issue a contract, policy, or guarantee of insurance except in accordance with filings approved as provided in this subtitle, except for special or unusual risks for which a filing has not yet been provided.

Each title insurer must hold to the rates or premiums as approved by the Commissioner and may not deviate from the rates or premiums or allow to or for the account of an insured a rebate or discount on the rates or premiums payable.
A title insurer may pay or allow a commission to a licensed insurance producer of the title insurer as compensation for procuring business.
